attributes.comment:
The process of adopting a child domesticaly or internationally is challenging and
time consuming enough. Please extend the length of time that the 1-171H is valid
so that all the waiting families that are already waiting through increased wait
times do not have to be further penalized to re-file another I-600A and in our case
have to drive 4 hours to get re-fingerprinted. Those of us who chose to adopt a
child have been through enough already.

However, if we do have to re-file because the countries we are adopting from have
longer wait times and thus our forms expire, then please do not increase the
amount of money we have to pay for something we have already done and expires
out of our control and so only becomes another expense to the waiting family.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Catherine Gardner
